cases.title: Add to Cart
cases.description: Testing added to the cart with some products from the products section with a discount.
cases.preconditions: The home page loads succsseffuly. The user chooses some options from the drop-down menu with a discount product.

steps.action: Chose different products whit color and size and  click the button “ДОБАВИ“
steps.expected_result: All chosen products are added to the cart successfully.

cases.title: Delete
cases.description: Delete some products from the cart.
cases.preconditions: There are added products in the cart.

steps.expected_result: The cart is displayed on the screen with the selected products.

steps.action: Choose some product and click the delete button which is located to the price of the product.
steps.expected_result: The chosen product is deleted successfully from the cart.
